title: Ticket #4685: Test that condor_rm'ed DAGMan doesn't remove its node jobs
description:
We should modify the job_dagman_rm test to have it check that DAGMan itself does not remove its node jobs (leaving that to the schedd in this case).

Maybe one way to do this would be to specify a non-standard "condor_rm" binary to DAGMan, which would cause the test to fail if it gets run...
